import "../index.css" import NavBar from "../componentes/NavBar" import Footer from '../componentes/Footer' import Cards from "../componentes/Cards" import React, {useState, useContext } from 'react' import Context from '../Contenxt' const Vestidos = () => { const{tienda} = useContext (Context); const allCategories = [ 'All', ...new Set(tienda.map(article => article.categoria)),]; console.log(allCategories) return ( <>
Vestidos
) } export default Vestidos
